title: Five Cartridges
overview: It is the year 1936 and the Spanish Civil War is raging. When the German commander of an international brigade is badly wounded he gives his five comrades a message which he divides up and secretes into in five cartridges. All five shells must reach the battalion in order for the message to be relayed. But Frenchman Pierre canâ€™t bear the heat of the Sierra. When he leaves their hide-out to drink from a well he is hit by an enemy bullet.
